pages.text: Excellent, your villager has a job and somewhere to do it!$(br2)Now there's just one last thing we need to do.$(br2)If you talk to the villager, you will see that they want supplies.$(br2)Give the villager some food, and they should leave town to gather more supplies!
Hint: Villagers will tell you what they need. Place an item in their 6-slot inventory.
